metadata.name: Hollow Girl - I Am No One
metadata.description: When Kat Harlow was a child, she murdered her parents. Showing no sign of regret or remorse, she was said to be a girl without a soul - a HOLLOW GIRL. Now, she's a willing vessel for the vengeful dead, wearing an expressionless white mask to represent the inhabiting spirit. Something between a medium and a vigilante, she kills for the dead.
